subject: Problems using junit when class under test uses log4j.
msgSnippet: Hi, I trying to build a java application that uses log4j for logging. My test targets use log4j. When I try to test the class with JUnit the test throws
messageBody:

statements from the test class. Also, the target class work fine
(with logger) when it is run outside of junit.
